title: Mid and top need for ool plat+
body: Highly trained group but need a few more numbers pref if u could join asap for practice with us we have been a group for 2 years and have played in 2 ool tournaments and have won the losing bracket before looking to do better this time comment below mains and role pref add me on league for invite

replies.body: Mid main, Plat 1 atm, aiming for high diamond this season
